description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fear The Dronx is a strikingly unique puzzler for one or two players. Snare and destroy the evil Dronx mastermind on each of the games twisted levels. A fresh and innovative take on the puzzle genre.
description.short: Fear The Dronx is a strikingly unique puzzler for one or two players. Snare and destroy the evil Dronx mastermind on each of the games twisted levels. A fresh and innovative take on the puzzle genre.
